biotools.summary: Anyone from at least one of the Europe PMC Funders can submit an author manuscript for inclusion in Europe PubMed Central. Publishers can also submit manuscripts on behalf of authors.

bioschemas.name: Europe PMC plus Manuscript Submission System MSS
